oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Using Peak Milk as a Monitor of Dairy Herd Production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kearley, William P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dairy farm
production management
herd production
practice tips
Peak Milk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An emerging area of the veterinarian's involvment on a dairy farm is production management consultation. As a production consultant you are expected to monitor herd production and make recommendations that keep production at a profitable level.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1987; 163-164
